description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军总参谋长、总后勤部部长、成都军区司令员及兰州军区司令员。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army (PLA), who served as the Chief of the PLA General Staff, Director of the PLA General Logistics Department, Commander of the Chengdu Military Region, and Commander of the Lanzhou Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，傅全有之子。曾任第1集团军副军长、南京军区副参谋长、东部战区陆军副司令员等职。
description.en: A Major General of the People's Liberation Army and the son of Fu Quanyou. He has served as Deputy Commander of the 1st Group Army, Deputy Chief of Staff of the Nanjing Military Region, and Deputy Commander of the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战后期的一支主力部队。
description.en: A main force of the People's Liberation Army during the late stage of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 1945年至1950年间由中国国民党与中国共产党之间发生的内战。
description.en: The civil war fought between the Kuomintang (KMT) and the Communist Party of China (CPC) from 1945 to 1950.

description.zh-cn: 1950年代初期在朝鲜半岛爆发的一场战争，中国人民志愿军参与其中。
description.en: A war that broke out on the Korean Peninsula in the early 1950s, in which the Chinese People's Volunteer Army participated.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争期间派遣的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces dispatched by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军高等军事学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高等军事学院

description.zh-cn: 曾为中国人民解放军培养高级指挥官的最高学府。
description.en: A former top academy of the People's Liberation Army for training senior commanders.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的七大军区之一。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的七大军区之一。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The supreme national military command organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总后勤部
en: General Logistics Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中央军事委员会下属主管军队后勤建设和保障的领导机关。
description.en: It was the leading body under the Central Military Commission responsible for the logistical construction and support of the military.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
en: General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中央军事委员会下属主管全军军事工作的领导机关。
description.en: It was the leading body under the Central Military Commission responsible for the military work of the entire army.

description.zh-cn: 山西省的一个旧县名，今为原平市的一部分。
description.en: A former county in Shanxi Province, now part of Yuanping City.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个集团军，前身为南京军区部队，后隶属于东部战区陆军。
description.en: A group army of the PLA Ground Force, formerly part of the Nanjing Military Region and later subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一，隶属于东部战区。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy, subordinate to the Eastern Theater Command.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的七大军区之一。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军东部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军东部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军现有的五大战区之一。
description.en: One of the five current theater commands of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 傅勇是傅全有的儿子。
description.en: Fu Yong is the son of Fu Quanyou.

description.zh-cn: 傅全有于1946年10月参加中国人民解放军，2003年3月离休。
description.en: Fu Quanyou joined the People's Liberation Army in October 1946 and retired in March 2003.

description.zh-cn: 傅全有于1947年8月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Fu Quanyou joined the Communist Party of China in August 1947.

description.zh-cn: 1948年，傅全有在第一野战军担任副连长。
description.en: In 1948, Fu Quanyou served as a Deputy Company Commander in the First Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 傅全有作为中国人民解放军的一员参与了第二次国共内战。
description.en: As a member of the People's Liberation Army, Fu Quanyou participated in the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 傅全有随部队于1953年2月入朝参加朝鲜战争。
description.en: Fu Quanyou entered Korea with his unit in February 1953 to participate in the Korean War.

position.en: Battalion Chief of Staff, Deputy Battalion Commander, Battalion Commander

description.zh-cn: 傅全有在朝鲜战争期间担任中国人民志愿军的营参谋长、副营长、营长等职务。
description.en: During the Korean War, Fu Quanyou served as Battalion Chief of Staff, Deputy Battalion Commander, and Battalion Commander in the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军高等军事学院

description.zh-cn: 傅全有于1960年毕业于中国人民解放军高等军事学院，获大专学历。
description.en: Fu Quanyou graduated from the PLA Higher Military Academy in 1960 with a junior college diploma.

description.zh-cn: 1985年6月至1990年5月，傅全有担任成都军区司令员。
description.en: From June 1985 to May 1990, Fu Quanyou served as the Commander of the Chengdu Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 1990年5月至1992年10月，傅全有担任兰州军区司令员。
description.en: From May 1990 to October 1992, Fu Quanyou served as the Commander of the Lanzhou Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 1992年10月至2003年3月，傅全有担任中央军委委员。
description.en: From October 1992 to March 2003, Fu Quanyou served as a member of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

description.zh-cn: 1992年10月至1995年9月，傅全有担任中国人民解放军总后勤部部长。
description.en: From October 1992 to September 1995, Fu Quanyou served as the Director of the PLA General Logistics Department.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

description.zh-cn: 1995年9月至2002年11月，傅全有担任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: From September 1995 to November 2002, Fu Quanyou served as the Chief of the PLA General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 傅全有出生于山西省崞县。
description.en: Fu Quanyou was born in Guo County, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 傅勇曾任第1集团军某摩步旅旅长、集团军副参谋长，并于2010年升任该集团军副军长。
description.en: Fu Yong served as a motorized infantry brigade commander and deputy chief of staff of the 1st Group Army, and was promoted to Deputy Corps Commander in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 2011年，傅勇挂职担任海军东海舰队副参谋长。
description.en: In 2011, Fu Yong held a temporary post as Deputy Chief of Staff of the Navy's East Sea Fleet.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 2014年，傅勇升任中国人民解放军南京军区副参谋长。
description.en: In 2014, Fu Yong was promoted to Deputy Chief of Staff of the PLA Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军东部战区

position.en: Deputy Commander of the Ground Force

description.zh-cn: 2016年1月，傅勇出任新成立的中国人民解放军东部战区陆军副司令员。
description.en: In January 2016, Fu Yong became the Deputy Commander of the Ground Force of the newly established PLA Eastern Theater Command.
